alert.note: Alert for Arkansas; Cleveland; Dallas; Desha; Grant; Jefferson; Lincoln (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 17 at 1:42PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Cleveland, northwestern Desha, southeastern Grant, eastern Dallas, southern Jefferson, Lincoln and south central Arkansas Counties through 215 PM CDT... At 141 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Lamont to near Feenyville to near Plantersville. Movement was east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Pine Bluff... Dumas... Star City... Rison... Gould... Grady... Mitchellville... Whitefield... Woodville... Douglas... Nebo... Feenyville... Cottondale... Lamont... Omega... Linwood... Cane Creek State Park... Mills... Kelso... Kedron... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Arkansas; Cleveland; Dallas; Desha; Grant; Jefferson; Lincoln
